title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Marie Antoinette
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Julia Turner discuss Marie Antoinette, directed by Sofia Coppola and starring Kirsten Dunst. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
